messages.content: write an email to a customer that convinces it to buy the more expensive subscription

Subject: Upgrade your subscription to enjoy our premium features
Dear valued customer,
I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to you to offer you the chance to upgrade your subscription to enjoy our premium features. Our premium subscription brings you the best of what we have to offer, and it is a valuable addition to your experience with us.
With our premium subscription, you will have access to the following features:
* Exclusive discounts on our premium products
* Early access to new product launches
* Personalized recommendations based on your preferences
* Access to our exclusive events and workshops
* Priority support for any issues that may arise
Our premium subscription also includes access to exclusive content and resources that will help you achieve your goals and exceed your potential.
We understand that upgrading your subscription may require a financial commitment, and we want to make it as easy as possible for you. We offer a range of payment plans to suit your budget, and we provide flexible payment options to make it as easy as possible for you to get the most out of our premium subscription.
We also understand that decision-making can be a tough process, and we want to make it as easy as possible for you to make the right choice. That's why we are offering a 30-day free trial of our premium subscription, so you can experience the benefits of our premium features firsthand.
Don't let this opportunity pass you by. Sign up for the premium subscription today and experience the benefits of our premium features for yourself. We look forward to hearing from you soon and welcoming you to our exclusive community.
Thank you for considering our offer.
Best regards,
[Your Name]

Nice, but could you please edit some parts:
- The customers name is Tom
- The company is called Mega Corp. Inc.
- The product is a search engine that is business specific
- the customer currently pays 0.01 cent per search and the upgrade costs 0.1 cent per search
- the features are:
  - faster
  - contains internal document
  - better user management
  - ai features
you should convince the customer a lot more that theses are important features
Make a concise email that is max 100 words long.
tell a story how the new features changes your life
